name: IГIS
description: IГIS - Dynamo 2 Graph Colourisation + Customisation ----- IГIS is a Dynamo Extension that allows you to colourise your Dynamo Nodes + Connectors individually and without relying on Groups and their limited colour range ----- Custom settings can be defined for and stored inside each Dynamo Script. They will be displayed on every computer with the IГIS Extension installed and remain intact when the Extension is not present as long as the IГIS Node remains in the script ----- The Extension can be used to... - Improve readability of Dynamo scripts - Add visual cues to Nodes and Connectors - Categorise Nodes or parts of a script - Make Dynamo more colourful and fun
